title: Sausage and lentil casserole
ingredients: ['165g puy lentils, or green lentils, rinsed', '1 large onion', '2 cloves of garlic', 'oil for frying', '1 tin of chopped tomatoes', '1 bay leaf', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 1/2 teaspoons sugar', '6 to 8 good quality sausages, I prefer Cumberland', 'salt and pepper to taste']
